sentences.sContent: In a time when there is so much dispute about the compatibility or incompatibility of science with religion, it may be a good idea to revisit what Newton and Einstein had to say about God.
sentences.sContent_eng: In a time when there is so much dispute about the compatibility or incompatibility of science with religion, it may be a good idea to revisit what Newton and Einstein had to say about God.
sentences.sCn: 在这个科学与宗教到底相容还是不相容众说纷纭的时候 还是让我们重新审视一下牛顿和爱因斯坦怎么说主吧。

synos.tran: [免疫][数]不相容；不协调；不一致

words.tran: 不相容的；矛盾的；不能同时成立的
